theme_verse.text: And Jacob went out from Beersheba…

intro.summary: Learn the Bible in 52 weeks. This study covers Jacob's journey, his vision at Bethel, and the covenant events shaping Israel's future...
intro.instructions: How it works: Read daily, listen to audio, and meet weekly in your HomeGroup.

Torah: 31:43 – Laban and Jacob Make a Covenant

commentary.quote: There are few ideal families in the Bible. Jacob's certainly wasn't…
commentary.content: Jacob's story reveals the struggle between flesh and spirit, and how God redeems broken circumstances through covenant promises...

sections.deeper_learning: Explore the prophetic connections between Jacob's ladder and the Temple Mount. This passage unveils YHVH's sovereignty beyond time and space...
sections.aleph_tav: Key occurrences of את reveal divine fingerprints in the text, marking significant covenantal moments...
